name: Create a withdraw of a value greater than zero
scenarioId: classpath:features/transaction/create_withdraw:Create a withdraw of a value greater than zero
methodName: Create a withdraw of a value greater than zero

testSteps.description: Given the user has an active account in Tyny Bank
When the user makes a withdraw of "-100.00"
Then the account balance is decreased by "100.00"

reportData.title: Transaction Final State
reportData.contents: <200 OK OK,RestResponse(message=Transaction Registered Successfully, data={id=c9a2beea-644c-4933-b942-7e8b4d49b078, originAccountId=202401230001, destinationAccountId=null, amount=-100.0, type=WITHDRAW, accountBalanceCurrentValue=100.0, accountDestinationBalanceCurrentValue=0.0, date=2024-12-26T00:32:51.469100088}),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Thu, 26 Dec 2024 00:32:51 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
The withdraw transaction is a debit to the account balance that is created when a user makes a withdraw. The withdraw
  must be a transaction with value lower than zero and it only needs the origin account (in this case is the account
  addressed to apply the withdraw operation, not the account which money is being sent to).

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** withdraw a value from a bank account
  **So that I can** debit value from my account balance

title: Create a withdraw of a value greater than zero

rule.name: A withdraw to a user account must be a value greater than zero
